ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Having problems with 39 charm song
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to issue the /pet attack command several times for it to work.  Just keep hitting the hot key.  The dimwit will get the idea eventually.  In a lot of
ygData.messageBody:
I have to issue the /pet attack command several times for it to work. Just keep hitting the hot key. The
dimwit will get the idea eventually. In a lot of cases, you won't have to reissue it on the 2nd and
subsequent charms.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk


"Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" wrote:

> I have a different hotkey for /pet back off and /pet attack. I have been
> giving the /pet attack immediately after giving /pet back off. Perhaps I
> should pause a second or so next time to see if that is the problem.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
